author: vgeorgescu
msg: Add full depth support to wc-wc diffs and wc-repos diffs.
(adm_depth_from_depth): New function that converts a svn_depth_t to
an appropriate value for the depth argument of svn_wc_adm_open().
(diff_wc_wc): Take depth instead of recurse, call
(do_diff): Pass depth instead of recurse to diff_wc_wc().
(make_dir_baton): Take a depth argument, store it in dir_baton.
delete_entry, add_directory, open_directory, close_edit): Handle depth
correctly, and update calls to make_dir_baton().

author: holden
msg: Included the subversion bindings so that they can be tested

fixed sign in typemap from int to uint
Imported all of the subversion scheme bindings
Compiled the .o to an .so suitable for loading

author: ehu
msg: Start fixing issue #2861 (ra_neon silently ignores propset errors).

(validate_element): The table is longer than 1 element, but,

author: hwright
msg: When sorting and scrubbing file path/revision pairs, sort those that are not
the result of a merge "after" those that are.  In this way, we ensure a
revision only gets picked up once, and that the merged flag is only set if the
revision does not appear in the main line of history.
(compare_path_revision_revs): Also sort on the merged_revision flag.
(sort_and_scrub_revisions): Don't use the merged_revision flag when scrubbing
